column4: Hi, I'm using Ubuntu 10.10 (it was suported until 10 april 2012). When I run "update-manager -d" it show a button to upgrade to 11.04, but I want to upgrade to 12.04. How upgrade to 12.04?
to upgrade from 10-10 to 12-04 you need to upgrade to 11-04 then 11-10 then 12-04
ThinkT510 and quackers, thanks for the answers, now I gonna upgrade to 11.04 an so on. Bye
do backups first! upgrading so many times can be grievous!
